subject: AI Implementation Query
body: Hello, we're a mid-sized manufacturing company in Munich looking to implement AI for quality control. We produce automotive parts and need to detect defects in real-time. What solutions do you offer?
sender: Anna Weber, Quality Manager at AutoParts GmbH

subject: Partnership Opportunity
body: Hi, I represent a VC firm interested in AI startups. Would love to discuss potential collaboration. Are you open to investment discussions?
sender: Thomas Klein, Partner at VentureCapital AG

subject: Technical Support Needed
body: Our current AI model is showing degraded performance. Can you help us debug? We're seeing accuracy drop from 95% to 78% over the past month.

subject: Request for Proposal - Customer Service AI
body: We need an AI assistant for our e-commerce platform. Requirements: handle 1000+ daily inquiries, German/English support, integrate with Shopify. Please send pricing and timeline.

subject: Speaking Opportunity
body: Would you be interested in speaking at our AI conference in Berlin next month? Topic: Production ML systems. 500+ attendees expected.
sender: Lisa Schmidt, Event Manager at TechEvents
